Savage Attacks Information

"When you land a Critical Hit with a melee weapon attack, your damage dice are tripled instead of doubled"

This ability does not function as worded. When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.
